lines.text: Well, we've all got something in common, haven't we? That's right, It's Saturday Night! But it's not only Saturday night, it's also Wednesday night!
[pause]
I'm sorry, I don't know why I said that. Can I start over?
No, I'm sorry, but we just haven't got the time.
Well, then I hope you DIE!
Sex is a thing that people do while they're trying to get to sleep.
So without further ado ladies and gentlemen, let's wet our danger-buds as Sir Adrian teases us with some unusually dangerous bicycling!
I have got NO BRAKES.
No brakes!
I have got NO BRAKES.
No brakes!
I have got NO BRAKES.
[crashes bicycle into a wall]
Are you all right, Sir Adrian?
No.
So you want to play dirty, do you?
Yes I do! But I think we better finish the show first.
I've got the explosives!
Well, take them off!
Whatcha mean, what about the human bomb impression?
It's been cancelled!
Well why didn't you tell me before?
Because I'm a TOTAL BASTARD!
This has gone beyond a joke.
I don't think it's got that far yet.
[repeated line]
Unusually dangerous, I trust you'll agree
[repeated line]
Incalculably stupid, i trust you'll agree.
I might advise you at home not to try this trick, as it invariably ends in death.
That's revolting. What've you been eating?
Doggie doo.
Doggie doo?
Yeah. I did it for a bet.
A bet?
Yeah. I said "I bet that tastes disgusting!"
Dynamite down the pants... explode-o!
Now you keep quiet, while I set fire to you.

[Addressing the audience]
Everyone keep quiet while he sets fire to me.
There was a young woman from... uh... Knockers! Who had an enormous pair of... breasts! One was a whopper, one was a... jumbly wubbly, and the other was... an enormous, great big golden bozo!

[offscreen]
That's three!
THAT was a surprise kick in the goolies!
Nice to see you again, Sir Adrian!
Nice to be seen.
And now ladies and gentlemen, torture by female dog!
No no no! That one's a bitch!
The screams of the damned mingle with the, with the, with the, the CRIES of the, uh, the vegetable sellers of, of London town! No they don't, that's wrong, damn damn DAMN!
Well y'see, it's bloody hard to find a crocodile. Especially one that's prepared to snog with me!
Yeah, have you ever seen a gay crocodile?
Yeah, have you ever seen a happy crocodile?
Will you stop touching my bottom while I'm talking!
So without further ado ladies and gentlemen, let's wet out danger-buds as Sir Adrian teases us with some unusually dangerous bicycling!
I have got NO BRAKES.
No brakes!
I have got NO BRAKES.
No brakes!
I have got NO BRAKES.
[crashes bicycle into a wall]
Are you all right, Sir Adrian?
No.
